languages.text: "Вы возложили на меня руководство Адептус Арбитес в Просторе — стану я следующим маршалом, или нет, но мне придется покинуть свиту и целиком посвятить себя новому долгу".

"You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."
languages.original_text: "Вы возложили на меня руководство Адептус Арбитес в Просторе — стану я следующим маршалом, или нет, но мне придется покинуть свиту и целиком посвятить себя новому долгу".

traits.locale_text: "You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

"You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

"You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

"You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

"You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

languages.text: 「あなたは私に、このエクスパンスにおける高等裁定局の指揮を託してくれました。私が次の将帥になるかどうかにかかわらず、あなたの従者から離れ、新たな任務にすべてを捧げねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私に、このエクスパンスにおける高等裁定局の指揮を託してくれました。私が次の将帥になるかどうかにかかわらず、あなたの従者から離れ、新たな任務にすべてを捧げねばなりません」

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir die Führung des Adeptus Arbites in der Ausdehnung anvertraut – gleichgültig, ob ich der nächste Marschall werde oder nicht, ich werde Euer Gefolge verlassen und mich ganz meinem neuen Posten widmen müssen."
languages.original_text: "You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir die Führung des Adeptus Arbites in der Ausdehnung anvertraut – gleichgültig, ob ich der nächste Marschall werde oder nicht, ich werde Euer Gefolge verlassen und mich ganz meinem neuen Posten widmen müssen."

languages.text: « Vous m'avez confié le commandement de l'Adeptus Arbites au sein des Étendues. Que je devienne maréchal ou non, je devrai quitter votre entourage et me consacrer entièrement à mon nouveau poste. »
languages.original_text: "You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez confié le commandement de l'Adeptus Arbites au sein des Étendues. Que je devienne maréchal ou non, je devrai quitter votre entourage et me consacrer entièrement à mon nouveau poste. »

languages.text: «Me ha confiado el liderazgo del Adeptus Arbites en la Extensión; tanto si asumo el título de mariscal como si no, tendré que abandonar su séquito y dedicarme en cuerpo y alma a mi nuevo cargo».
languages.original_text: "You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

traits.locale_text: «Me ha confiado el liderazgo del Adeptus Arbites en la Extensión; tanto si asumo el título de mariscal como si no, tendré que abandonar su séquito y dedicarme en cuerpo y alma a mi nuevo cargo».

languages.text: “你已经委任我为科罗努斯扩区法务部的新任领袖。这样一来，无论我是否能成为下一任元帅，我都必须离开你的队伍，全身心投入到我的新岗位上。”
languages.original_text: "You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

traits.locale_text: “你已经委任我为科罗努斯扩区法务部的新任领袖。这样一来，无论我是否能成为下一任元帅，我都必须离开你的队伍，全身心投入到我的新岗位上。”

languages.text: "Enginlik'teki Adeptus Arbites'in liderliğini bana emanet ettin. Bir sonraki Miralay ben olsam da olmasam da maiyetinden ayrılmak ve kendimi tamamen yeni görevime adamak zorunda kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "You have entrusted me with the leadership of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse — whether I become the next Marshal or not, I will have to leave your retinue and devote myself entirely to my new post."

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik'teki Adeptus Arbites'in liderliğini bana emanet ettin. Bir sonraki Miralay ben olsam da olmasam da maiyetinden ayrılmak ve kendimi tamamen yeni görevime adamak zorunda kalacağım."
